column1: The  Petitioner imported a brand-new Toyota  Prado  KDJ150  Diesel  7-seater car through the  11th
Respondent of which the CIF  value was US$  35,000 according to the Petitioner. The  Petitioner is
challenging the  actions  of the  customs  in  valuing  the vehicle  according  to Gazette  bearing  no.
The  Petitioner is  further assailing the action  of the  customs  in failing to implement excise  duty
exemptions which he claims to be entitled in  terms of the law.
Article 10 of Schedule  E of the Customs Ordinance reads:
